name: author_bot
description: True/False if the given author is a bot or not.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: first_answer
description: Field containing '1' if item is the first answer to question.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Date when the item was created.

name: is_accepted_answer
description: Check if item is accepted answer.

name: is_askbot_answer
description: Used to separate answers from questions and comments.

name: is_askbot_comment
description: Used to separate comments from answers and questions.

name: is_askbot_question
description: Used to separate questions from answers and comments.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the data was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in ElasticSearch raw index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: origin
description: The original URL from which the items were retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).

name: question_answer_count
description: Count of answers to a question.

name: question_answer_ids
description: Ids of answers to a question.

name: question_has_accepted_answer
description: Check if question has an accepted answer.

name: question_last_activity_at
description: Date when the question was lastly answered.

name: question_last_activity_by_id
description: Id of the question was lastly answered.

name: question_last_activity_by_username
description: Username of author who answered the question lastly.

name: question_view_count
description: Count of views for the question.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: type
description: Type of the item (answer, comment, question).
